title: Services set for shooting victim, 13
content:
PINE RIDGE | Mourners will gather at the Pine Ridge Elementary School on Tuesday and Wednesday to honor Te’Ca Lynn Clifford, the 13-year-old victim of a gun shooting last week.
Wake services will begin 3 p.m. Tuesday, July 26, at the school’s gym. The funeral will begin at 10 a.m. Wednesday, July 27, with the Rev. Rhoda Mesteth officiating and Jim Miller providing traditional Lakota rituals.
